response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's worth noting that this product has an intrinsic value of $15,000 to me. However, considering its potential worth to you, I am proposing to sell it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise that allows us both to benefit from this transaction. I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
